taskDescription:
Rewrite <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>16</mn>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mi>z</mi>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
        <mn>9</mn>
      </mrow>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">16{z^{ - 9}}</annotation></semantics></math> without negative exponents.
